title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 24
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 24
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: David Wilson Stocks Editor Bloomberg News Discussing his Chart of the Day "Consider the S&P 500 as a convertible bond." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
